imdb.plot outline: Hniya Mbarek o Massâoude is a comedy of 30 episodes that tells the life of a simple family of Marrakech. Hniya a woman in her fifties age, widow. and has one son who is Mbark. her husband with a young woman in the neighborhood. except that the beautiful girl did not come alone, she brings her brother with her to her husband. things become complicated because Hniya becomes jealous of her daughter, which has also pushed to search for a husband. the choice falls on Massâoude that the brother of the woman Mbarek. and this little family will live each day a strange situation, inspired by the daily Moroccan citizen.
